name: Mesh NG
summary:
Mesh is an eye popping, ear pleasing, nerve wracking game of skill and reflexes!
In this game you use your finger to destroy neon blocks that fall through the mesh in an attempt to get the highest score. But watch out for the "special" blocks which can end the run or have unforeseen effects on the gameplay! The more you play the harder it gets, but the better you get the higher the scores!
